resources.string:
Welcome to Gama! Before you embark on a seamless journey with us, please take a moment to familiarize yourself with our terms and conditions. Your understanding of these guidelines ensures a smoother experience for you and fellow users.
1. Customized Locations: - For complete auto bookings, enjoy the convenience of customized locations. - Share auto bookings default to the route from VITAP to VIJAYAWADA.
2. Cancellation Charges: - Cancel for free up to 3 hours before your scheduled ride. - Rs 49 cancellation fee applies if canceled 1 hour before the ride. - Rs 99 cancellation fee applies if canceled before 30 minutes of the scheduled ride. - no cancellations will be allowed within the 30 minutes of the scheduled ride.
3. Responsibility Disclaimer: - Gama acts as a bridge between students and auto drivers. - We do not assume responsibility for any loss or inconvenience during or after your ride. - User caution is advised while interacting with auto drivers.
4. Refund Policy: - If your ride is canceled due to unforeseen circumstances, expect a refund within 3 hours.
5. User Conduct: - Treat auto drivers respectfully and adhere to local laws. - Misconduct may result in the suspension or termination of your account.
6. Privacy and Data Security: - We prioritize your privacy and data security. Refer to our privacy policy for details.
7. Service Availability: - While we strive for reliability, factors beyond our control may affect service availability.
8. Feedback and Support: - We value your feedback to enhance our services. Reach out to customerreportgama@gmail.com for assistance.
9. Modification of Terms: - Gama may modify terms at any time. Users will be notified, and continued use implies acceptance.
10. Termination of Services: - Gama reserves the right to terminate services for misuse or violation of terms.
Thank you for choosing Gama! Your adherence to these terms ensures a positive experience for all users. Safe travels!
